text: Va ʙa on mardume, ki ʙa notavonī aftoda ʙudand, şarqu ƣarʙi on sarzaminro, ki ʙarakat doda ʙudem, ʙa meros dodem va va'dai nekūe, ki Parvardigori tu ʙa ʙanī—Isroil doda ʙud, ʙa on saʙaʙ, ki saʙr namuda ʙudand, ʙa kamol rasid va har ciro Fir'avnu qavmaş mesoxtand va qasrhoero, ki ʙarmeafroştand, vajron kardem
